body_html:
Since I think this still looks a bit awkward with the header:

I'm going to try to design my own ribbon as an evening side project :) Based on a vertical one (maybe a bit smaller than in this example):

But tell me if you prefer the original GitHub ribbon, 'cause that would be a lot of effort for nothing ;)
body_text:
Since I think this still looks a bit awkward with the header:

I'm going to try to design my own ribbon as an evening side project :) Based on a vertical one (maybe a bit smaller than in this example):

But tell me if you prefer the original GitHub ribbon, 'cause that would be a lot of effort for nothing ;)
body: Since I think this still looks a bit awkward with the header: I'm going to try to design my own ribbon as an evening side project :) Based on a vertical one (maybe a bit smaller than in this example): ![ribbon-vertical](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11146524/8706815/1b66c132-2b32-11e5-8be9-ca28a4fb8b07.png) But tell me if you prefer the original GitHub ribbon, 'cause that would be a lot of effort for nothing ;)
